subject: RE: Priority web projects
preview: Ok cool, we thought that was the case, but wanted to double check. Speak soon!

Ok cool, we thought that was the case, but wanted to double check. 

Speak soon!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Hi Lucy,

Do you want these updated on the Global site as well?

@glen did you update the global site as well?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body: upon checking the link, there is no content on it.
@glen could you please double check this? Thanks!

From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Subject: RE: Priority web projects
Date: 7 July 2021 at 4:38:01 pm AEST
To: Heath

Hey Heath,

Just had Karina review the carpet tile pages and unfortunately it seems the wrong link was accessed for the carpet spec sheets.

The link in my latest email contains the most recent specs, see here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zqhrflk9u7xqwtc/AAAtX70FEK-UXgv1VqnZL9LAa?dl=0

The updated specs in the link attached are slightly different in that they state that all QuietBack™ carpet tiles have a minimum recycled content of “=> 80% recycled PET content”, so we will need to replace the QuietBack spec sheets and also ensure that the specification table on each page contains this updated information:



The BarrierBack™ spec sheets also need to be updated as seems like Vittina, Elevate and Flow and displaying old spec sheets.

Can you also please make the below 2 small changes to the Vittina page to reflect the spec sheet:



Sorry for the confusion. Thanks Heath!


Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790
Level 8, 26 Flinders Street, Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com

On 30 Jun 2021, at 1:03 pm, Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt > wrote:

Hey Heath,

Priority web tasks for both the AU and ROW sites are:

Upload Olga’s media release (sent in email attached) to NEWS page
Upload new carpet tile spec sheets and update specification tables on all carpet product pages (email attached with notes on what to change on spec tables on each product page)
Please use carpet specs contained in this link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zqhrflk9u7xqwtc/AAAtX70FEK-UXgv1VqnZL9LAa?dl=0
Upload TWO new Timbertop SLAT spec sheets and update specification tables on Timbertop Slat product page
2 x Timbertop slat specs to add also in this link: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/zqhrflk9u7xqwtc/AAAtX70FEK-UXgv1VqnZL9LAa?dl=0
Please name the 2 spec sheets ‘Specification sheet – FilaSorb12’ and ‘Specification sheet – FilaSorb30’
Please note the FOUR thicknesses to add, and the correlating fire testing data to include on the product page, as well as the updated ‘composition’, and ‘material’ fields.
Please update our ADELAIDE office address on the contact-us page to: Level 8, 26 Flinders Street, Adelaide SA 5000.

Hope all makes sense – let me know if you need any extra detail on any of these.

Once these are complete I’ll send the remaining tasks across 😊

Thanks heaps!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager



T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790
Level 8, 26 Flinders Street, Adelaide SA 5000
acoufelt.com

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.
Hi Lucy,

We do have more access as of about 30mins ago. They are still refining the solution however.

The US marketing team would have little visibility as to our reduced access/issues we have been having. They have only been tasked with getting the US site operational and only know what the US agency would have been telling them.

We will be able to recommence working on the tasks now. The downloads are all available again already no as well. We may still come across some limitations, but for the most part we can operate as normal.

Are there any priority tasks you would like us to address?

Thanks,


Heath Maguire
CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134
Mobile: 0415 162 271
Email: heath@wolfiq.com.au

I’ve also noticed my WP logins are no longer working, which might be related.

Thanks Heath.
